    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    class Map contains all the method to interact with the map

           int difficulty,
           int row,
           int column)
    throws NotValidMatrixException
        class constructor initialize the object Map type
        Parameters:
        glassWindowName - name of the matrix, refers to the corrispondent card
        difficulty - level of difficulty of the matrix
        row - number of row of the matrix
        column - number of column of the matrix
        Throws:
        NotValidMatrixException

      • existDice

        public boolean existDice(Dice dice,
                         int row,
                         int column)
        controls if the passed dice is really in the passed coordinates or not
        Parameters:
        dice - the supposed dice on cell
        row - row's coordinate on the map where there should be the passed dice
        column - column's coordinate on the map where there should be the passed dice
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the dice is compatible with the dice on the cell, else false
